definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: dung (ball of dung, Ar. jil=ah;un etc., dung of camels etc., cf. Aram. [[גַּלָּא]]; on form v. Ew:§ 255 b Ol:§ 150. 163)—sf. [[גֶּלֲלוֹ]] Job 20:7, pl. cstr. [[הָאָדָם]] ([[חֵאַת]]) [[גֶּלֲלֵי]] Ez Eze 4:12, Eze 4:15; —human dung used as fuel Ez Eze 4:12, Eze 4:15 [[הָאָדָם]] ([[חֵאַת]]) ´[[ג]]; perh. also Job 20:7, but cf. Di, who thinks no ref. to fuel, & De who thinks of cattle-dung; (v. on Ar. word Wetzst in De).—See also II. [[גׇּלָל]].
